page.title: 05CHILDRENS GAMES West Forres
page.content: ln our area the games we play depend upon whether you are a boy or a girl and whether it is summer or winter.In summer boys play games such as Speedway and Fraggle Rock.These are played in the playground.In Speedway one person is 'it'. The others keep running around and must not cross lines or go backwards.Once a person is touched by the person who is 'it' then he becomes 'it'.Fraggle Rock is a running and jumping game.Girls play skipping and dancing games which have songs and rhymes to go with them such as Cross the Bible and Spanish Ladies.During the summer they play Handstands and Hopscotch.Together boys and girls play Hide and Seek and Shadow Tig.
